header.title: DrupalCon North America 2021
header.subtitle: COME MEET THIRD AND GROVE AT DRUPALCON 2021

booth.header: Drop by our virtual booth for a chat during DrupalCon Global 2021! Feel free to attend our speaker sessions, too!

swag.header: Get A FREE Third and Grove Webcam Cover
swag.subheader: Get A FREE Third and Grove Webcam Cover
swag.body: We know it’s been a long year. You were stuck inside, mask-mandated, staring at a screen all day.  Use this handy webcam cover to conceal that beautiful mug from onlookers. Or better yet, enjoy a Zoom call in your robe and keep your shenanigans from plain sight. (Just don’t tell HR on us!)

tag.header: DrupalCon is one of our favorite conferences of the year
tag.body:
DrupalCon Global event organizers are working hard to bring you a virtual version of the DrupalCon experience you know and love. The event will take place April 12th-16th, 2021 Online, and you can register for the event now.

Third and Grove is excited to share thought leadership around all things open- source. We will walk you through how we craft digital experiences and discover opportunities to enhance B2B lead generation strategies, and how to be ready for Drupal 10.

We know Drupal like the back of our hand. DrupalCon Global will have everything from keynotes, sessions, industry and topical summits, discussion groups, networking opportunities, and much more. Be sure to drop by the Third and Grove booth and get to know us a little better.

quote.text: It’s a rare opportunity that an agency like TAG can fit in so well with our in-house team. The support, partnership, and commitment to creating a custom solution for our multi-lingual sites made all the difference in our successful launch.
quote.author: Steve Reichgut, Former Director of Web Engineering & Web Operations at Benefit Cosmetics

qas.title: How to improve Core Web Vitals with Drupal
Learn Digital Strategies for Higher Ed
